website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of American-made cookie cutters at a valuable price point.
pros: Set includes all of the classic holiday shapes
Comes with a cookies and frosting recipe book to get you inspired
Crisp edges give cookies an accurate shape
Sits at a value price point
cons: Dry cutters immediately after washing to avoid rust

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are all the same size so that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are all the same size so that they bake evenly on a tray with different shapes on it. They are very sturdy. I picked this set over the Wilton ones mostly because the shapes are crisp (not overly rounded) and the gingerbread man actually looks like a gingerbread man rather than like a short guy trying to do the splits.
customer_reviews.author: wornoutballetshoes

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookie Cutters and Made in America!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters were as described. Not very heavy, but they do the job very well. I just started getting into the decorating of cookies. I have to admit its a lot of fun, and these cutters worked out very well for me. I will be buying more of the Ann Clark Cookie Cutters in the future. That they are made in America is a key factor in buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: great size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these but then went shopping at a local dollar store for some because I wanted to try a new recipe last week. Let me just say you get what you pay for. The size of these are perfect....dollar store size....well look at the picture. I didnt get the recipe book they said comes with it, so I contacted them and they are sending it. I am very pleased...Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Washington

customer_reviews.title: Head Their Warning, They Rust Easily
customer_reviews.text: Cute Set, Had all the traditional shapes you want and in smaller sizes. They do warn you to dry them off as soon as you wash them because they can rust and boy they weren't kidding. Oh Well, they weren't inexpensive for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mccord

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters. Not only a nice size and every shape for the Christmas season but they're made in the good ol' USA.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cookie cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cookie cutters. Size is excellent for small kids. Very sturdy, but cutting edges clean and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: CSalBike

customer_reviews.title: Have Christmas any time with cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I love all the different shapes-makes a interesting plate of cookies. I sometimes have trouble getting all of the dough out of the cookie cutter. Now I want to try to use the cookie cutters on different things-pancakes, french toast, sandwiches,etc. I don't care if they are for Christmas- Christmas is happy time-I'm happy when I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mischief

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I was making cookies two days before Christmas when I realized I’d lost my cookie cutters in a recent move. My only choices were a dog bone or dog paw, neither very Christmasy. I saw these cutters online, having every shape I wanted, I decided to order them. Less than 24 hours later they were in my mailbox. I was a little worried when they arrived in a padded envelope, but all is well. They are very light but very sturdy. Great shapes, great quality, made in the US. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Nansredvet

customer_reviews.title: Traditional Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I downsized my "stuff" about two years ago and gave away my Christmas cookie cutters, well, life being what it is, I found myself in need of some cutters to keep up a Christmas Eve tradition with the grand kids. These cutters are wonderful, nice sharp edges that make it easy for little hands to make a perfect gingerbread man, right size, not to big, not to small. I would recommend these cutters to anyone, plus they are made in the USA. Even better!
customer_reviews.author: GMa

customer_reviews.title: Christmas cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters seem like they will work great! I haven't had the chance to use them yet, but they are well made and look easy to clean. I am a little disappointed in the recipe book. I thought it would be an actual book with a few recipes. Instead it's a little pamphlet booklet with two cookie recipes and a dog biscuit recipe. Oh well. I'm still pretty pleased with the product and can't wait to make Christmas cookies with them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST COOKIE CUTTERS!
customer_reviews.text: The cookie cutters are TOP Quality and Very Well Made. They look and work Great ! The Best part is that they are made in the USA!! That was the main reason that I bought them , I LOVED these so much that I am planning on buying more of the other seasonal cutters and other items made by Ann Clark. Great company to order from , the cutters came packaged very nice and could not be Happier !
customer_reviews.author: carla honaker

customer_reviews.title: recipe book
customer_reviews.text: In the description it says 5 cookie cutters and a recipe book. The cookie cutters are fine but you do not get a recipe book it is a small pamphlet with 3 or 4 recipes......very disappointing as I am not a baker and I bought this as my granddaughter will be visiting for the Holidays and wants to bake Christmas cookies on Christmas Eve.
customer_reviews.author: karen Matheson

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really sturdy and nice cookie cutters! My Christmas cookies cut out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and exactly as described. They make very clean cuts in dough. Sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Cleaned up in the dishwasher easily. Kids had a blast making Christmas cookies this year!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Like them!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me at Christmas when I needed to make last minute tree decorations out of gingerbread.
customer_reviews.author: Cockaigne

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Memories in a cookie cutter
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they reminded me of the cookie cutters my mother used many years ago. I have been disappointed in plastic cutters and now I find that these metal ones are perfect! There’s a nice variety of Christmas shapes and the cutters themselves are sharp and a nice size. Thanks for the memories!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: I intend these will be used for holidays to come. Constructed well, nice shaping and size.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey LeSage

customer_reviews.title: Well made cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these cookie cutters. They are the perfect size for Christmas cookies - not too big, not too small, and clean up beautifully with some soap on a scrubby sponge or brush under running water. DO NOT put in dishwasher or soak these kinds of cookie cutters in water - they will rust.
customer_reviews.author: JS from Portland

customer_reviews.title: Cookies cutters
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cutters going to have fun with this thanks
customer_reviews.author: richard martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, just buy it you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Package opened
customer_reviews.text: Package was partially open but looks to be just ok hope next package isn't like the two I received today will write more when I use them
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: Look to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a chance to use these yet. They seem to be of good quality. I want to use them for Christmas cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: Cutter review
customer_reviews.text: Recipe book was smaller in size and content that was perceived in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters. Made sugar cookies that turned out beautiful. I handwashed them, not sure if they are dishwasher safe. Love that they are made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We got these to make ornaments! They are super cute
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Bacon

customer_reviews.title: The cookie cutters are lovely shapes. I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: The cookie cutters are lovely shapes. I would have given 5 stars, but they arrived a week after promised and not in time to bake for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cookie cutters! They are well made and so cute. I bought them to make Christmas cookies with my grandchildren and also to make ornaments out of cinnamon applesauce mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as represented
customer_reviews.text: This set isn’t worth the money the recipe book is a page folded up. Everything is wrapped in a plastic bag, it’s not suitable for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I guess they were made in USA although not on cutters. Anyway worked great !
customer_reviews.author: hubbaboo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to make my Christmas Cookies this year!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Knollmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: The cookie shapes are the classic Christmas holiday shapes I was looking for. They made perfect sized cookies that were fun to decorate. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great quality. They were a tad smaller than I was expecting but none the less, a great cookie cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters but I do hand wash them; no idea if they will rust if they go in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Angclikel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and American Made
customer_reviews.text: I will be using these for the first time this weekend and I'm so excited to use an American made product. Along with the cookie cutters there was a little pamphlet with recipes and decorating tips.....I'll be getting my baking on this weekend :)
customer_reviews.author: lodis lover

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality traditional cookie cutters also the labels peel off easily - often a very time consuming process

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cookie cutters, but no one in our liked the accompanying recipe for sugar cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Notes

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters with amazing recipe book!
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters with AWESOME recipe book. Seriously the best cookies I’ve ever had. The cutters work great and are easy to clean. Very pleased with my purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Too cheap. Bend. Cookie batter gets stuck. Go with better quality.

customer_reviews.title: Good package of good cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as expected. Nice size for Christmas cookies. Good assortment
customer_reviews.author: SkipB - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and much more sturdier that I expected! And bigger then they look.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great cookies!
customer_reviews.text: They were easy for my grand children to use and easy to clean! Very satisfied with product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are not Ann Clark, no stickers on cookie cutters. And all rusty, worse than the cheap ones I bought from cheap Chinese website.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super simple and easy to use. Kids enjoyed cookie decorating.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cookie cutters for a good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miller's Amazon

customer_reviews.title: They look to be excellent
customer_reviews.text: Can not finish this survey as I will now be using the Christmas cookie. Cutters till November.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I love the sturdiness of the cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of the cookie cutters, as well as the nice selection. There is nothing that I dislike about them. Haven't used them yet but will let you know if there is anything I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Byrta Ford

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I didn't get the Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I received the package today. Bought the three pack expecting the snowflake gingerbread man and christmas tree, but instead of the tree I got the star. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Christmas cookie cutters so cute for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Holiday Cookie Cutters! Everyone loves Christmas cookies and a cup of tea/coffee. The Grand kids love the shapes. They want to eat one of each. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Muscarello

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters and made in the USA! I’m telling my family and friends. I look forward to ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use for any age person.
customer_reviews.text: The cookie cutters are the right size, nice variety for the Christmas season. Easy to use for most children and adults.
customer_reviews.author: SHERMAN BEKKUM

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cookie cutters. Classic patterns, slightly sharp on one side and dull on the other to slice through dough.

customer_reviews.title: Rusts
customer_reviews.text: This is what happened after the second wash without drying. I thought they were stainless steel.

customer_reviews.title: but I’m pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet, but I’m pleased with the quality. And the are the perfect size!

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Love these cookie cutters. Worked great and will use again.

customer_reviews.text: I'm very excited to try these out at Christmas! They're just the right size.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Just used them and they were great.

customer_reviews.text: After washing (by hand) the cooking cutters for the first time, they ended up with “oxide" all over. I won’t recommend it, I won’t buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, wash up and dry nicely. Will definitely use over and over!

customer_reviews.title: We liked the quality of the cutter and supporting American made ...
customer_reviews.text: We liked the quality of the cutter and supporting American made product the most. We disliked the fact that they are not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Alley Style

customer_reviews.title: The cookie cutters are just like the ones I had when my daughter was growing ...
customer_reviews.text: The cookie cutters are just like the ones I had when my daughter was growing up. Now she can use these with her daughter.

customer_reviews.title: but I'm already in love with them
customer_reviews.text: I have used them once only, but I'm already in love with them!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters were great!!! My favorite was the Ugly Sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar French

customer_reviews.title: I assume that these could have been useful cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I assume that these could have been useful cookie cutters. But they arrived completely mangled and totally useless - had to toss the whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Cookie Cutters
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I tried to make Christmas cookies with these. I don't know if it was my recipe (standard sugar cookie) or what, but none of the shapes were retained and they all looked this same. Still, very sturdy cutters and similar to my cutters that are over 50 years old. Better than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Down South

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made and reasonably priced cookie cutters.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cookie cutters as a gift so I don’t know first hand how well they work. I do know from the looks of them that they are well made and sturdy. Good medium sized cutters. If I need any more cutters for myself I would buy these first!
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect big enough sized for kids to decorate and eat. The cutters are light weight but sturdy and sharp enough to make clean cuts. The cookie shapes baked well but note that cookie corners in general become more rounded after baked, so the gingerbread man cookie looks the most likes it's cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Beakman

customer_reviews.title: Not too Big and Not too Small....JUST RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters are well made. Nice size, not too big and not too small. The added bonus of the small booklet that includes recipes eliminates the need to search for recipes.
customer_reviews.author: john campo

customer_reviews.title: Good size cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once so I can't say much about how durable they are, but they seem to be okay. They are easy to use and clean. I like that they are a bit bigger than other ones I have seen on here that are "child" size lol.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Placido

customer_reviews.title: Cookie Cutters, Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookie cutters, made in the USA, basic Christmas shapes without the small edges that burn when you bake. Great products, I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Candle Molds
customer_reviews.text: Used them to make candles for Christmas gifts. The wax popped right out once it was set. Cleaned well. Only use them for crafting not baking.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with the Little One
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with my granddaughter. We cook when she visits and these were for gingerbread cookies. She absolutely loved making the different shaped cookies.

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: love these cookie cutters, they are easy to use and make sharp edge cuts highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.text: We made some Christmas cookies this year and got these cookie cutters. I love the fact that these are made in America!

customer_reviews.title: The cookie cutters are great. Nice shapes and sharp enough to make clear ...
customer_reviews.text: The cookie cutters are great. Nice shapes and sharp enough to make clear edges on the dough. As satisfied as I am, I would like to have had a couple of the shapes be smaller so that I could have made some cookies not so big. I used a small glass to make round shapes, but a smaller star or snowflake would be nice. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate McMullan

customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make salt dough ornaments with my kids and they work great. I think they will last for many years.

product_meta.title: Ann Clark Cookie Cutters 5-Piece Christmas and Holiday Cookie Cutter Set with Recipe Booklet, Snowflake, Star, Christmas Tree, Gingerbread Man and Angel
feature_bullets: 5-Piece Christmas and Holiday Cookie Cutter Set - Get ready for your holiday baking with this 5-piece Christmas Cookie Cutter Set.
Made in the USA - Manufactured in America with certified food safe American steel
Variety – For over 30 years the Clark Family has specialized in original designs for creative baking
Baking and Party Supplies - Cut, mold and decorate themed shapes for any holiday, party or event
Create - Make fun shapes with cookie dough, fondant, biscuits, brownies, cakes, or craft clay

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars467 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
